law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the board of directors of a credit union.

section.section: "Branch" means a credit union office at which shares or deposits are received, share drafts or checks are paid, or money is lent.
"Branch" includes a mobile branch or other special-purpose facility that performs a function of a branch.
"Branch" does not include an automated teller machine as defined in § 1-401(d) of this article.

text.section: "Credit union" means a cooperative, nonprofit financial institution organized under this title to conduct business in the State.

"Credit union service organization" means an entity formed to engage in activities that:
Are incidental to the conduct of the business of a credit union;
Advance or facilitate the purposes of a credit union; and
Primarily serve a credit union and its members.

section.section: "Credit union share guaranty corporation" means a corporation engaged in the business of guaranteeing or insuring payment of a credit union share or deposit account.
"Credit union share guaranty corporation" includes the Credit Union Insurance Corporation established under Title 7 of this article.

text.section: "Deposit account" means a balance held by a credit union on which a contractual rate of interest may be paid as a debt owed by the credit union to the depositor.
"Fixed assets" include land, buildings, leasehold improvements, furniture, fixtures, and equipment used in the conduct of the regular business of a credit union.

"Member in good standing" means a member who:
Owns at least one share in a credit union;
Is current on all credit obligations to the credit union; and
Has not caused the credit union a credit or deposit loss that is currently outstanding.
"Officer" means any officer that a Maryland corporation is required or permitted to have under § 2-412 of the Corporations and Associations Article.

"Official" means:
A director;
A member of a credit committee; or
A member of a supervisory committee.

"Out-of-state credit union" means:
A federal credit union with its main office in a state other than this State; or
A credit union chartered and primarily regulated by another state.
"Share" or "share account" means a balance held by a credit union on which a dividend may be paid and which confers membership and voting rights on the member.
